item.description:
Update: Tee time is 11:40. Please don't be late.

The weather was pretty good for golf last Saturday so let's try it again. Check back here the morning of the event for any updates.

Goodwin Golf Course:

The 18-hole "Goodwin" course at the Goodwin Golf Course facility in Hartford, Connecticut features 6,015 yards of golf from the longest tees for a par of 70 . The course rating is 68.0 and it has a slope rating of 116. Designed by (R) Everett Pyle, the Goodwin golf course opened in 1910.


I played on this course a couple of times last year and it's pretty forgiving. It's a good course for beginners.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet in the pro shop at 11:30.
item.name: Goodwin Golf Course - 9 Holes
